abstract: The European Central Bank plans to buy bonds backed by loans to consumers and companies starting next month.
snippet: The European Central Bank plans to buy bonds backed by loans to consumers and companies starting next month.
lead_paragraph: By promising to rev up the printing presses, the European Central Bank has created hope in the markets that Europe may finally start to overcome its economic challenges.

headline.main: Promise From European Central Bank Is Also a Gamble
headline.print_headline: Promise From European Central Bank Is Also a Gamble

byline.original: By Peter Eavis and Alexandra Stevenson
